JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Company is looking for a Team Manager for construction.

We are looking for someone who has experience or knowledge of construction work. You must have some experience, which implies that you are handy with your hands, but at the same time can think independently. You would be employed as a Team Manager for a group where it is important that you have leadership qualities and fit in well with the profile we are looking for. You would be the leader of a group of 4-6 people, where you must be able to be part of a team that takes care of building maintenance. Requirements: - Minimum 3 months experience in the construction industry - Possible recommendation - Leadership qualities (Course/certificate not required) - Can speak English both in writing and orally. - "Be" handy with your hands.

Salary is given according to qualifications and minimum requirements for employment for you.

If you are interested, contact us by email. Please send a recommendation and CV on yourself.

details.FormattedPurpose:
Company is looking for a Team Manager for construction.

We are looking for someone who has experience or knowledge of construction work. You must have some experience, which implies that you are handy with your hands, but at the same time can think independently. You would be employed as a Team Manager for a group where it is important that you have leadership qualities and fit in well with the profile we are looking for. You would be the leader of a group of 4-6 people, where you must be able to be part of a team that takes care of building maintenance. Requirements: - Minimum 3 months experience in the construction industry - Possible recommendation - Leadership qualities (Course/certificate not required) - Can speak English both in writing and orally. - "Be" handy with your hands.

Salary is given according to qualifications and minimum requirements for employment for you.

If you are interested, contact us by email. Please send a recommendation and CV on yourself.
